Package com.okta.spring.oauth

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClaimsAuthoritiesExtractor
    A AuthoritiesExtractor converts a list of Groups/Roles in an JWT token into Spring Security GrantedAuthority.
    ClaimsPrincipalExtractor
    A PrincipalExtractor pulls a Principal, out of a configurable claim based on the {code}principalClaimKey{code}.
    ConfigurableAccessTokenConverter
    Adjusts the default map of JWT access token claims based on a configurable scope and role claim field.
    OktaPropertiesMappingEnvironmentPostProcessor
    This EnvironmentPostProcessor configures additional PropertySources that map OIDC discovery metadata and standard Okta properties to standard Spring Boot OAuth2 properties.
    OktaTokenServicesConfig  
    OktaTokenServicesConfig.LocalTokenValidationConfig  
    OktaTokenServicesConfig.RemoteTokenValidationConfig  
    OktaUserInfoTokenServices
    Okta UserInfoTokenServices that supports OAuth scopes.
    ScopeSupportedOAuth2Request  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OAuth2AccessTokenValidationException
